meanings.definition: Used to express mild annoyance or frustration.
meanings.sent1: Drat! I forgot my lunch at home.
meanings.sent2: Oh drat, I spilled my juice on the table.
meanings.sent3: Drat, I missed the bus again!
meanings.sent4: The rain ruined our picnic plans, drat it all!
meanings.sent5: Drat, why does this always happen to me?

meanings.definition: An exclamation of disappointment or irritation.
meanings.sent1: Drat! I dropped my ice cream cone.
meanings.sent2: Oh drat, I lost my favorite pen.
meanings.sent3: Drat, I burnt the cookies in the oven.
meanings.sent4: The movie ended on a cliffhanger, drat it!
meanings.sent5: Drat, why does bad luck follow me everywhere?
